svg.text: Lebenszyklus “as built”
Describes the condition of a component, vehicle after assembly in the respective plant. Each individual part or batch is represented as a digital twin.
SerialPart
Batch
JustInSequencePart
BatteryTractionCode
SingleLevelBomAsBuilt
SingleLevelUsageAsBuilt
Represents the master data of a component with its own serial number after the assembly process.
Relevant for manufacturers of serialized individual parts or vehicle manufacturers.
Represents the master data of a batch after the assembly process. Relevant for manufacturers of components with large batches, which
are produced under the same manufacturing conditions and bundled in a batch number.
Represents master data of a “Just-in-Sequence” part (JIS) after the assembly process. JIS components mostly don’t have a conventional
serial number, but a “call-off” number or JIS number.
Is used to provide the identification codes (GBT codes) which have to be provided when exporting automotive traction batteries to the
People's Republic of China. These codes are needed on the level of the traction battery cell, module and pack.
Represents the relationship between the components after the assembly process top-down. For example which vehicle was assembled
with which serialized part (transmission) from which batch (gear wheel, raw material) .
Represents the relationship between the components after the assembly process bottom-up. For example, which batch (gear, raw
material) is used in which serialized part (transmission).
